txt.en: 'It seems that many Trolls reside within the Towers of the Teeth. They most likely stay locked away out of the daylight, they very much dislike. You and your allies should defeat the Trolls gathered within Narchost. Quickly, before the Host of the West arrives!'

'It seems that many trolls reside within the Towers of the Teeth. They most likely stay locked away during what passes for daylight here. If you and your allies were to enter the Towers, you would do well to reduce their number - and quickly before the Host of the West arrives!'
Candúr is concerned with the number of trolls he has seen entering the dark foundations of the Towers of the Teeth.
Mordor war-trolls can be found within The Towers of the Teeth.\n\nYou should defeat Mordor war-trolls.
'You have done much to aid the Rangers. I commend you and your allies on the effort you put forth.'
You should return to Candúr, who can be found at a small Ranger outpost hidden in the Slag-hills.
